remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require use of the associated ILS Localizer receiver.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Confirm that the associated LOC receiver is not required for planned approach minimums.
Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 3a.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "___ LOCALIZER INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
